GSD.description:
drm/gma500: Fix BUG: sleeping function called from invalid context errors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit a6ed7624bf4d0a32f2631e74828bca7b7bf15afd. For more details please see the references link.
